title: 91/40/EEC: Commission Decision of 20 December 1990 amending Decision 88/222/EEC recognizing certain Member States or regions of certain Member States as being free from Quadraspidiotus perniciosus (San José Scale)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 20 December 1990  amending Decision 88/222/EEC recognizing certain Member States or regions of certain Member States as being free from Quadraspidiotus perniciosus (San José Scale)  (91/40/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1
Decision 88/222/EEC is hereby amended in accordance with the Annex hereto.  Article 2
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 December 1990. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission   (1) OJ No L 26, 31. 1. 1977, p. 20. (2) OJ No L 16, 22. 1. 1991, p. 29. (3) OJ No L 100, 19. 4. 1988, p. 41. (4) OJ No L 315, 15. 11. 1990, p. 34.
ANNEX

- Angra do Heroísmo (Regiao autónoma dos Açores),
